name: Skyways (demo)
description:
It's the year 2998 and you're a young space agent who has been assigned a mission by the President of the USA. Your mission is to explore the planets of a solar system to find and activate a series of transmitters.
This version of Skyways is incomplete and a work-in-progress. The full game will be released on Steam once it is finished. Learn more on the Helmersoft YouTube channel or on the Discord server!
